about_the_game:
Check out the Demo episode of Uncover the Smoking Gun.
Talk with the quirky bot Echo and find out who is the culprit behind Stanley's murder.

# Questions, Doubts... Truth!

"What if robots gained free will? Would they still exist for humanity's sake?"
In 2030, a world where robots and humans coexist faces a chilling series of murders!
The prime suspects? Robots living among us.
Unearth the scattered evidence at crime scenes,
and navigate through the web of truth and deception in the robots' testimonies.

# No Choices, Only Questions.

Your questions are the keys to unraveling the case.
All victims are linked to an experiment called "Project Atlas."
Subject X, Atlas Chip, and H.R.P.
What massive truth is hidden behind this chain of events?

# Game Features

- Experience 5 gripping episodes.
- Engage in deep conversations with case-related robots to uncover the incident's full story and crucial clues.
- If the suspect robot is the culprit, trigger system overload questions to switch them to confession mode, revealing the incident's truth.
- Discover hidden stories by finding all evidence and confirming the case's truth.
- Utilize the investigation status board actively to ensure you don't miss any vital clues or decisive questions.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 580 / AMD HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: A Battle of Wits with AI: Solve the case by conversing with a suspect robot using GPT to gather evidence. What single truth emerges from countless dialogues and pieces of information?

English*, Korean*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
